content: Ed McMahon Has Bone Cancer Former "Tonight Show" Sidekick, TV Pitchman Hospitalized In Intensive Care (CBS) Ed McMahon, former sidekick to Johnny Carson on "The Tonight Show" and a familiar TV commercial pitchman, is hospitalized in intensive care, and a person close to him said Friday that McMahon has bone cancer. Spokesman Howard Bragman said McMahon, 85, had been hospitalized for several weeks for treatment of pneumonia and other ailments. He declined to identify the Los Angeles facility. Full story at ... >http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2009/02/28/entertainment/main4835785.shtml

title: Ed McMahon Has Bone Cancer
